subject: Simsonn Plus X Issues
description_text:
Hi,

I received my order of Simsonn Plus X pedals today, 3 pedal plus plate
configuration.

When I use the brake pedal it's extremely difficult to apply pressure to
the load cell, it will only register 15kg of pressure at maximum push even
with the softest possible settings.

In addition, when I apply the clutch pedal, the brake registers half the
load it used to and therefore doesn't apply the brake properly in game.

I have calibrated through the software and the issue persists. Can you help?

Thanks

Joe Thompson

conversations.body_text: Hi Skeeve,     Please first connect all three pedals to the controller box, then unplug and reconnect the USB cable. Next, open SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2 and click the Offset button. Follow the on-screen steps in the pop-up window to reset the white signal to 0%. After that, please recalibrate the pedals.  If you would like stronger pedal resistance, you can switch to the stiffer blue or yellow elastomers.

Hello, I completed these steps but the brake pressure still drops when I
press either clutch or throttle pedal, even when applying a constant
pressure with a clamp to the brake to ensure it's not a physical reaction
Hi Skeeve,  Could you please record a video for our engineers to review? Kindly upload it to Google Drive, share the link with view access, and we will analyze it for you.

Hello, hopefully this video contains enough information

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1vr1d_9O2MGg2y0HF4C5EAU5JRFfqOZth/view?usp=sharing

It shows when I depress the brake pedal some force gets applied, however
when I press the throttle at the same time all braking force is removed,
and coming off the throttle reapplies the braking force

On Thu, Jan 8, 2026 at 9:50 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Skeeve,      Launch the latest version of SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2.  On the “Plus X” control unit, press and hold the “Upgrade” button.  While holding the button, unplug the USB cable from the PC and then plug it back in. The software should detect the device entering “SIMSONN Flasher update mode”.  In the software go to: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update.  In the file selector choose: pedals‑firmware → pedals‑plusx.sfu.  Click “Start Update” and wait until the firmware is completely written. During this process do not disconnect the USB or close the application.  Once the update is finished (you’ll get a success prompt or the unit will reboot), unplug and re‑plug the USB then test the pedal device to confirm everything works correctly.

Hello, I followed these steps however the issue is still there, pressing
the brake shows force, but as soon as I press the throttle at the same time
the brake loses force
